hi thanks for this but i thought i woud let you know that ep 44 wont play properly, it wont play in WMP and in vlc player it keeps stopping
all good media player classic plays it fine
Hmm......really I would like to know why it is not working on vlc because for me it worked all fine.

I also had a problem with Episode 44.  I went to Windows Media Player's online help, but it wasn't helpful.  It didn't even give me a new Codex to download.  I also tried the file with Nero Showtime and QuickTime, but neither played it.

I deleted the file and attempted to download it to see if there had been a problem in the original download.  However, I got the same error.  Here is what the online help says, if it's any use to you.

http://www.microsoft.com/windows/windowsmedia/player/webhelp/default.aspx?&mpver=11.0.5721.5268&id=C00D1199&contextid=83&originalid=80040218
Sooooo Slooooow :( come on seed
are there more Episodes after this Season
Nope there are not. BTW I always mention that when ending the series in the description and the series is also moved from Ongoing to Previous End Dubbed Animation :)
Episode 44 is still not cooperating.  Any chance of getting this fixed?  Thanks!

Hey Mavin, you may want to try using something other than WMP since it often gives a lot of folks issues. I usually use GOM player and have absolutely no issues with anything I torrent. Hope this helps ya bud. ^_^
Thanks for pointing me to GOM, Rychen.  That worked.   Now I can finish watching Blood +. LOL
